The photograph features a real creature: 2. There is no such thing as a "Georgia Speekle."
The image is actually taken from a 2014: in which a biologist was shown preparing a display specimen of a giant isopod (Bathynomus giganteus) that was found at a depth of 3,000 feet in the Gulf of Mexico.
We searched the web sites of the Amateur: Society, the Bug Guide, and the Department of Entomology at Penn State University, and found no record of any insect named the "Georgia Speekle."
